snippet: Michael Schumacher turned down an offer from Lotus to drive the final two races of the Formula One season as a replacement for the injured Kimi Raikkonen.
abstract: Retired racer Michael Schumacher turns down an offer from Lotus to drive the final two races of the Formula One season as a replacement for the injured Kimi Raikkonen.
lead_paragraph: Michael Schumacher turned down an offer from Lotus to drive the final two races of the Formula One season as a replacement for the injured Kimi Raikkonen.

headline.main: Schumacher Stays Retired from Formula One
